Key Match Events: Memphis Grizzlies led by as many as 45 points
The Grizzlies had 58 points in the paint against the Blazers
Clingan finished with 13 points and Edey had 12
Edey boxed out Clingan and popped out the rebound to Pippen Jr., who made the 3-pointer to put the Grizzlies up 29-11
Pre-Game Insights: The Blazers held a moment of silence before the game for former broadcaster Brian Wheeler
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies went into the game leading the league in points in the paint with 60.8. They had 58 against the Blazers
The Blazers finished just 4 of 42 from 3-point range
The Grizzlies have won five of their last six games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jerami Grant scored 20 points for Portland, which has lost three straight
Memphis was missing Ja Morant, who is day-to-day with an injured right hip, and Marcus Smart and Desmond Bane
The Blazers shot just 17 of 49 from the floor in the first half
The Grizzlies' 5-foot-8 Rookie Yuki Kawamura came into the game in the fourth quarter to applause from the Blazers fans
